content:
# The refueling attempt was unsuccessful, as the furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) still shows an empty inventory after I added coal. 
# This indicates that the furnace is not recognizing the coal I inserted, which may be due to it not being properly connected to any ingredients for smelting.

# The current inventory remains as follows:
# - 5 stone
# - 2 iron ore
# - 4 iron plates
# - 5 iron gear wheels

# Since the furnace is not operational, I need to ensure that it has the necessary ingredients to smelt. 
# I will insert the 2 iron ore I have into the same furnace, as it can process iron ore into iron plates.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, first_furnace, quantity=2)  # Insert iron ore into the furnace

# After inserting the iron ore, I will check the furnace's status again to see if it can now process the materials.
print(f"Furnace at position {first_furnace.position} status after adding iron ore: {inspect_inventory(first_furnace)}")  # Check updated furnace status
print(f"Updated Inventory after adding iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Verify inventory after adding iron ore
